document_name: Decree No. 2-17-672 creating the training institute for the professions of renewable energies and energetic efficiency (IFMEREE) in Oujda
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MAR/2017/MAR-2017-07-12-Decree No. 2-17-672 creating the training institute for the professions of renewable energies and energetic efficiency (IFMEREE) in Oujda_b4ca55ab371c44c1411854cb1472bf8f.pdf
document_description: This decree creates the Training Institute for renewable energies and energy efficiency (IFMEREE) in Oujda. The Institute's mission is to contribute to the development of training, research and expertise in the fields of renewable energies and energy efficiency.
